title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue

text:
526-530 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner of York Avenue. The house belonged to Mrs. Vredenburgh in 1874; to G. W. Vredenburg in 1898; to G. W. Van Vredenburg in 1907, and to Wm. T. Van Vredenburg in 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.

July 7, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue

text:
536 Richmond Terrace, west of the S.W. corner of York Avenue. The house was owned by Mrs. Vredenburgh in 1874; by W. T. Vredenburg in 1898; and by W. T. Van Vredenburg from 1907 to 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.

July 7, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue

text:
Richmond Terrace, east from (No. 472) a point east of Jersey Street.
June 11, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Jersey Street
